title: Mobile Shot
content:
Mobile Shot Actions Make a Ranged Attack while moving. Prerequisite: Must have Dashed or Disengaged this turn. 18m Short Rest Bonus Action

Make a Ranged Attack while moving.

Prerequisite: Must have Dashed or Disengaged this turn.

Mobile Shot is an Action in Baldur's Gate 3. Actions can be used in both exploration and combat to maneuver across the battlefield or to harm or aid Characters. The actions that a Character can perform are based on their Class and Equipment.
